Bag O' Links - 5/8/2009

  • 100 open source functional testing tools – for those of off the rails.
  • Unit Testing javascript – i was asking a fellow javascript ninja the other day about it, seems like there isn’t any de-facto tool for that, JSUnit seems nice thu.
  • JQuery spreadsheet – best on i had seen so far.
  • Really neat silverlight like Search in JQuery? – nice and sexy, i don’t know how useful that is, but i might think of something later.

GitHub Treasures

  • ODFreport – generate ODT (Open Office Text) with this gem.
  • insight – a university CMS system in rails.
  • WebDAVtools – manage WebDAV actions with this gem.
